quote: Tell me a truth, Senna.""""I don't know how.""""Then tell me a lie.""""I don't love you.""""The truth is for the mind,"" he says. ""Lies are for the heart. So let's just keep lying.
quote_letters: TELL ME A TRUTH SENNAI DONT KNOW HOWTHEN TELL ME A LIEI DONT LOVE YOUTHE TRUTH IS FOR THE MIND HE SAYS LIES ARE FOR THE HEART SO LETS JUST KEEP LYING
